  • Reference

Indices for the cross validation jobs.

make_iimat.Rd

The resulting iimat looks like this:

Usage

make_iimat(cv_gridsize, nfold, nrestart)

Arguments

cv_gridsize

CV grid size.

nfold

Number of CV folds.

nrestart

Number of random restarts of EM algorithm.

Value

Integer matrix.

Details

ind iprob imu ifold irestart 55 6 1 2 1 56 7 1 2 1 57 1 2 2 1 58 2 2 2 1 59 3 2 2 1 60 4 2 2 1
